deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@notice Only can be called from a registered vault
 @param _pid The pool ID
@notice Only can be called on home chain

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint16,uint8,bytes memory,bytes memory,struct IStargateRouter.lzTxObj memory) view external returns (uint256,uint256)

documentation.text:
@notice Dummy func to allow .selector call above and guarantee typesafety for abi calls.
 @dev Should never ever be actually called.

@notice Called by oracle to remove slashed ZOR rewards and reset
 @return _slashedZORRewards The amount of accumulated slashed ZOR rewards

@notice Awards the slashed ZOR rewards from other chains to this (home) chain's ZOR staking vault
 @param _slashedZORRewards The amount of accumulated slashed ZOR rewards

params._amountUSDBuyback: Amount of USD to buy back
params._amountUSDRevShare: Amount of USD to rev share with ZOR single staking vault
params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage.

returns._0: uint256 Quantity of native token as fees

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

receiveXChainDistributionRequest(uint256.details: Should never ever be actually called.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._buybackAmountUSD: Amount in USD to buy back
params._revShareAmountUSD: Amount in USD to revshare w/ ZOR single staking vault

params._controller: Bytes representation of smart contract address for cross chain contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

checkXChainDistributeEarningsFee(uint256.notice: Checks to see how much a cross chain earnings distribution will cost

receiveXChainDistributionRequest(uint256.notice: Dummy func to allow .selector call above and guarantee typesafety for abi calls.

sendXChainDistributeEarningsRequest(uint.notice: Sends a request back to the home chain to distribute earnings

setControllerContract(uint256,bytes).notice: Setter: Controller contract for each chain

setStargateDestPoolIds(uint256,uint16).notice: Setter: Stargate dest pool IDs for USD asset
